title: Has anyone received the confirmation email
content: The councelling for btech was yesterday morning and they still haven't sent us the emailðŸ«

comments.body: not yet, prolly cause its a sunday?
I hope you are right then
The login credentials one??
Nah
The email regarding seat confirmation in the preferred branch and further steps
Do you think we will receive it by tomorrow?
no idea dude, hopefully. btw, did u attend online counselling
Recieved an email subject admission status ..body: congrats ur application has been accepted and these are ur login credentials and password for pesu app (PRN) one
Glad to know I ain't the only one
Yah the morning one at 8am, wbu?
Yes this is the one but idk why I haven't received this yet. When did you get this ?
Yesterday

Did you attend the offline counselling cuz I attended the online one as I am from outside karnataka so i dont really know about the domicile issue 
Does your mail mention the branch tho?
I attended offline and am non karnataka students and no I t didn't mention the branch
2nd one
Okay so did they say anything Abt the confirmation email and by when will they send it ?
Okay thanks bro, did they say anything about the class commencement date and schedule?
they mentioned in the meeting that the email would come within 48 hours of counselling, so we wait ig. thats all i heard
was this for round 1? round 2 still hasn't started, right?
Yes
did online students receive the mail yet??
No at least I haven't yet received any sort of mail
